text: hananim-eun geudaeege geu ijeon e gyesidoen geos-eul hwagjunghago jung-eonha myeo seongseoleul gyesihanani hananim-i gyesihan geos-eulo geudeul-eun jaepanhadoe jeong-uieseo beos-eonan geudeul-ui yogue ttaleuji malla hananim-eun neohui gagja ege yulbeob-eul jueossnani hananim-ui tteus-ilamyeon neohuiege gongdongcheleul hyeongseongke halyeo ham-ila geuleona geubun-eun geugeos-eulo neohuileul siheomhalyeo ham-ini seonhaeng-e gyeongjuhala neohuiui modeun geos eun hananimkkelo gwiuihamyeo neohuiga dallihago issneun geos-e daehayeo balghyeo jusilila
